login_login_unknown_login_error: Cannot reach the Whiff server, check the internet connection
login_login_incorrect_login_format: You haven't provided the email adress in the textfield.
login_login_password_do_too_short: Password too short. It requires at least 6 letters.
login_login_terms_of_service_question: Do you accept Terms of Service and Privacy Policy?
onboarding_air_state_good_description:
No critical alerts about the air outside. 
Feel free with physical activity outside or ventilating rooms.
onboarding_air_state_moderate_descriptio:
No critical alerts about the air outside.  
Feel free with physical activity outside or ventilating rooms.
onboarding_air_state_bad_description: Consider limit or postpone physical activity outside. Symptoms like cough or sore throat could occur, especially in sensitive ones (pregnant women or children).
onboarding_air_state_very_bad_descriptio: Do not ventilate rooms. Sensitive ones (especially pregnant women and children) should avoid activity outside.
onboarding_air_state_unknown_description:
It looks like there is no outdoor sensor adde to your account. 
 The WhiffApp couldn't get air state, please contact support to resolve problem.
error_no_internet_connection: No internet connection, check out your system settings and phone's network reception.
error_server_unavailable: Our server is unavailable now, please try again later.
error_server_response_decode_problem: An error occurred within the server communication process
failure_page_empty_sensors_list_message: Please contact our support and request to add sensors to your account
account_setting_no_sensor_label_text: There aren't any sensors assigned to your account.
welcome_page_subtitle:
We are glad, that you use the Whiff App.
 However, you need the Whiff sensor 
 to provide data to the app. 
 If you don’t own the Whiff Sensor, you could add test sensors to your account
second_welcome_subtitle_demo:
The Whiff has configured the test sensors to your account. 
 They are located in: 
 Warsaw, Poland 
 .To get more details about Whiff visit our page.
second_welcome_subtitle:
It looks like you configured your Whiff account.  
 Be up to date to the air state with Whiff and stay healthy.
sensor_manager_empty_list_description: Please, add sensor to the list.
sensor_manager_whiff_sensor_warning_text: You haven't added any sensor. Are you sure?
sensor_manager_whiff_delete_sensor_warni: You are going to delete sensor from your account. Are you sure?"
sensor_manager_subtitle_text: Please, provide the sensor number and key
